quests.name: A Space Ranger Recruit
objectives:
Gather materials for the Space Ranger Ship:
  ‧ 3 Glass
  ‧ 10 Hardwood
  ‧ 5 Iron Ingot
Craft the Space Ranger Ship
Place the Space Ranger Ship near Buzz's RV.
Return to Buzz
Talk to Scrooge McDuck

Gather the ingredients for the Navy Blue Dye
  ‧ 3 Blue Falling Penstemon
  ‧ 10 Coal Ore
  ‧ 15 Blueberry
  ‧ 1 Empty Vial
Craft some Navy Navy Blue Dye

Gather what Scrooge McDuck asked for:
  ‧ 15 Fiber
  ‧ 15 Softwood
  ‧ 1 Navy Blue Dye
  ‧ 1 Topaz
Bring the materials to Scrooge McDuck

Put on the Space Ranger Uniform:
  ‧ Space Ranger Helmet
  ‧  Space Ranger Wings
Report to Buzz

quests.name: A Space Ranger Reputation
objectives: Listen to Buzz and Ursula
Talk to Buzz after his defeat
Go to the Toy Story Realm
Gather 3 Buzz Lightyear Playing Cards hidden in the books around Bonnie's Room
Return to Buzz
Search Merlin's, Donald's and Mickey's Houses for 3 Blank Sheet of Paper
Craft 3 Buzz Lightyear Leaflet
Bring Buzz Lightyear Leaflets to Buzz

Bring a Buzz Lightyear Leaflet to
  ‧ Donald Duck
  ‧ Maui
  ‧ Ursula
Return to Buzz

quests.name: The Fragmented Past
objectives: Go to the river in the Forest of Valor with Buzz
Search for a buried clue about Buzz's past along the river in the Forest of Valor.
Talk to Buzz
Talk to Scar

Gathering the following meals
  ‧ Fish Soup
  ‧ Tuna Burger
Bring the meals to Scar
Search Scar's Cave for an object proving his past friendship with Buzz
You found another part of the Memory! Talk to Buzz.
Fish the next clue from the river on the Sunlit Plateau.
Open your Inventory and investigate the Old Fishing Rod.
Talk to Buzz.
Listen as Buzz talks to Scar
Return to Buzz.

quests.name: The Definition of a Hero
objectives: Witness as Buzz apologizes to Ursula
Talk to Buzz

Gather the materials for the Space Ranger Badges:
  ‧ 3 Iron Ingot
  ‧ 3 Fabric
  ‧ 3 Blue Ink
Craft 3 Space Ranger Badge
Talk to Buzz

Bring the Space Ranger Badges to
  ‧ Remy
  ‧ Moana
  ‧ Scar
Talk to Buzz

Craft what's needed for the Star Command Academy Grand Opening:
  ‧ 20 Asphalt
  ‧ 1 Blue and Silver Balloon Arch

Place everything for the Grand Opening around Buzz's RV:
  ‧ 20 Asphalt
  ‧ 1 Blue and Silver Balloon Arch
Return to Buzz
Place the  Space Ranger Buffet near Buzz's RV.

Put on your Space Ranger Uniform (optional)
  ‧ Space Ranger Helmet
  ‧ Space Ranger Wings
Launch the Star Command Academy Grand Opening
Return to Buzz

quests.name: Collect 'Em All: Little Green Men!
objectives: Calling all Space Rangers! Star Command alert!
Report to Buzz
Keep an eye out for Alien Toys scattered around the Biomes of the Village! (25)
Bring the  Alien Toys to Buzz

quests.name: Collect 'Em All: Strangers from the Outside!
objectives: Calling all Space Rangers! Another intergalactic threat has been spotted!
Report to Buzz
Keep an eye out for Alien Toys in Villagers' Houses (15)
Bring the Alien Toys to Buzz

quests.name: Collect 'Em All: Attic Mode
objectives:
Calling all Space Rangers! Star Command alert!
  ‧ Report to Buzz
Keep an eye out for Alien Toys scattered in common areas and secret spots. (15)

quests.name: We Are Eternally Grateful!
objectives: Calling all Space Rangers!
Report to Buzz

Create the perfect "Alien Habitat" in the Village:
  ‧ Place 10 Playful Furniture (10)
  ‧ Place 3 Red Furniture
  ‧ Place 2 Purple Furniture
  ‧ Place 4 Alien Toys
Take a picture of your Alien Habitat
Report to Buzz

quests.name: Training Games: The Space Ranger
objectives: Talk to Buzz Lightyear.
Dig somewhere sunny (Sunlit Plateau) with trees and bones for Buzz's Flag.
Bring Buzz's Flag to Buzz.
